Paytable.paybackBody: For this game, the long-term, theoretically-expected payback {RTP}.
Paytable.overallChances: There is a 1 in {odds} overall chance of winning a prize on each play.

Error.genericErrorText: There has been an internal error. EXIT and relaunch the game.

Game.page1_1: Swipe pieces of fruit to swap them.
Game.page1_2: Match 3-5 fruits of the same type in a row or column to clear them.
Game.page2_0: Match 4 fruits to create a line clear fruit. When matched, this fruit clears an entire row or column.
Game.page3_0: Swap 2 line clear fruits to perform a cross line clear.
Game.page4_0: Match 5 fruits to create a cherry bomb.
Game.page5_0: The cherry bomb explodes when moved and clears the fruits around it..
Game.page6_0: Complete juice orders by collecting individual fruit types. Each completed juice order earns a bonus game glass.
Game.page6_1: As glasses of juice are awarded, juice orders are updated until maxed out.
Game.page7_0: Match an empty glass with any 2 or more of the same fruit type for an additional glass pick in the bonus game.
Game.page8_0: Match a jug with any 2 or more of the same fruit type to clear all matching fruits from the game board and earn an additional move.
Game.page9_0: Select glasses and reveal 3 identical prizes to win the amount displayed.
Game.page10_0: Find the purple instant win prize and win that amount.
Game.page10_1: The amount of glasses displayed in the bonus game is determined by the number of glasses won in the base game.
